english.segment1: I have seen my own gravestone and worshiped the golden statue. Ive made my bed in the lion's den and walked in dead man's shoes. I have witnessed coastline from a bird's eye view. And I made the request that we plunge to our death so that I could get to You
english.segment2: I will walk through the fire. I will not be afraid. They can take everything that I have. But they cant give me my name
english.segment3: I have climbed every bookshelf. In search of hardcover proof. And if I am judged by the things I have loved. I hope some of them are true
english.segment4: "Do whatever fulfills you. Make the most of each day". Thats what were taught since before we could walk. But it all will fade away
